name: Standard Medkit (1 Use)
description: One use provides 1d4 healing to a target if Heal skill is used. Grants +1 bonus to Heal checks.

name: Emergency Medkit (1 Use)
description: One use provides 1d2 healing to a target if Heal skill is used. Grants +1 bonus to Heal checks, but takes 2 rounds to use.

name: Stim-Dose
description: Grants +2 bonus to one physical attribute (Str, Dex, Con) for 10 minutes. Can also provide +1 Hit Die of healing. After effect, user takes 1d4 non-lethal damage from fatigue.

name: Pain Suppressor
description: Suppresses pain from non-fatal injuries. For 1 hour, ignores penalties from being Wounded (half HP). After effect, gain 1 Stress point.

name: Antitox
description: Neutralizes common biological and chemical toxins. Grants +4 bonus to saving throws versus poison or disease for 1 hour.

name: Synth-Rations (1 Day)
description: Provides basic nutritional needs for one person for one day. Unappetizing.

name: Survival Rations (3 Days)
description: Compact, vacuum-sealed nutrient paste. Provides 3 days of sustenance.

name: Water Purifier Tablet
description: Purifies 1 liter of non-toxic water. Makes water potable.

name: Flare
description: Emits bright light for 1d4 hours. Can be thrown 10 meters.

name: Chemical Lightstick
description: Provides dim light in a 5-meter radius for 8 hours. Single use.

name: Thermal Grenade
description: Deals 4d4 damage in a 5-meter radius. Area becomes difficult terrain for 1 round.

name: Flashbang Grenade
description: Suppresses foes in a 10-meter radius for 1 round (Con save vs. blinding/deafening).

name: Smoke Grenade
description: Creates a 10-meter radius cloud of thick smoke for 1d4 rounds, imposing -4 to ranged attacks passing through it.

name: Frag Grenade
description: Deals 3d6 damage in a 5-meter radius. Shrapnel can bypass light cover.

name: Concussion Grenade
description: Deals 2d6 damage in 5-meter radius. Foes must make Con save or be knocked prone and lose next action.

name: Energy Cell (Pistol/Rifle)
description: Provides 15 shots for a laser pistol or 30 for a laser rifle.

name: Energy Cell (Heavy)
description: Provides 10 shots for a plasma rifle or 20 for a heavy laser.

name: Magazine (Assault Rifle)
description: 30 rounds for a projectile assault rifle.

name: Magazine (Heavy Pistol)
description: 12 rounds for a heavy pistol.

name: Power Pack (Standard)
description: Powers standard utility tools or small devices for 8 hours.

name: Power Pack (High-Cap)
description: Powers high-drain tools or devices for 8 hours, or standard devices for 24 hours.

name: Universal Repair Paste
description: Can patch minor hull breaches or system damage. Provides 1d4 temporary HP to a vehicle/device for 1 hour. Requires Fix (Int) check.

name: Comms Scrambler (1 Use)
description: For 1d4 rounds, scrambles local comms traffic in a 100m radius. Disposable.

name: Disguise Kit (1 Use)
description: Contains basic makeup, wigs, and clothing alterations for one significant disguise. Grants +1 bonus to Disguise checks.

name: Climbing Gear (1 Use)
description: Contains ropes, pitons, and grappling hooks for one difficult ascent/descent. Grants +1 bonus to Exert (Str) climbing checks.

name: Breaching Charge (Small)
description: Single use. Can blast through a reinforced door (AC 12, 15 HP) or light wall (AC 10, 10 HP). Loud.

name: Datapad (Blank)
description: A blank datapad for storing information.

name: Encryption Key (1 Use)
description: A single-use key that can grant temporary access to a specific, commonly encountered encryption level. Chance of failure (GM discretion).

name: Psion Suppressor Pellet
description: When ingested, grants +2 bonus to saving throws against psionic powers for 1d4 hours. Induces 1 Stress point after effect.

name: Mood Regulator
description: Subtly alters mood for 1d4 hours. Grants +1 bonus to Talk (Cha) for persuasion or Lie (Cha) for deception. After effect, -1 penalty to mental attribute for 1 hour.

name: Synth-Alcohol (Bottle)
description: Low-grade recreational beverage. Can reduce Stress by 1, but causes -1 penalty to physical attributes for 1d4 hours.

name: Joy-Dose
description: Euphoric stimulant. Grants +1 bonus to one mental attribute (Int, Wis, Cha) for 1 hour. Causes 1d2 Stress after effect, and user becomes addicted on repeated use.

name: Black Market Medkit (1 Use)
description: Crude but effective. Provides 1d6 healing, but causes 1d2 damage from scarring/infection unless Heal (Wis) check (DC 8) is passed.

name: Data Spike (1 Use)
description: Single use. Provides a temporary +2 bonus to one Program (Int) check to bypass a digital lock or firewall. Self-destructs after use.

name: Neural Inhibitor Dart
description: Deals 1d4 non-lethal damage. Target must make Con save or be Suppressed (lose next action) for 1 round.

name: Portable Field Generator (1 Use)
description: Deploys a small, temporary energy barrier (AC 15, 5 HP) for 1d4 rounds. Single use.

name: Sonic Emitter (Small)
description: Can be used to create a distracting noise in a small area for 1d4 rounds, imposing -2 to Notice (Wis) checks in the area.

name: EMP Grenade
description: Disables unshielded electronic devices (drones, comms, automated turrets) in a 10m radius for 1d4 rounds. Deals no damage to organic targets.

name: Grapple Gun (1 Use)
description: Fires a grappling hook up to 50m. Automatically reels user in. Single use battery.

name: Ablative Patch
description: Can temporarily increase AC by +1 for 1d4 rounds when applied to armor. Single use.

name: Water Rebreather (1 Hr)
description: Allows breathing underwater for 1 hour. Small, mouthpiece device.

name: Lockpick Kit (1 Use)
description: Contains disposable picks and shims. Grants +1 to Fix (Int) checks to bypass mechanical locks. Breaks on a failed check.

name: Holo-Projector (Small)
description: Can project a static 3D image or short animation for 1d4 rounds. Useful for diversions. Single use battery.

name: Bio-Tracker Dart
description: Fired from a launcher. Embeds a silent, short-range tracking beacon (1km radius) into target for 1d6 hours.

name: Neural Stun Pellet (Projectile)
description: Target must make Con save or be knocked unconscious for 1d4 rounds. Deals 1d4 non-lethal damage.

name: Field Rations (7 Days)
description: Advanced, self-heating survival meals for one person for 7 days.

name: Fuel Canister (Small)
description: Provides 1 unit of fuel for small vehicles or generators.

name: Adhesive Grenade
description: Explodes with a burst of super-strong adhesive, trapping foes in a 5m radius (Str save vs. being Stuck for 1d4 rounds).

name: Sonic Distractor (1 Use)
description: Emits a high-pitched, irritating tone for 1d6 rounds, imposing -2 to all mental attribute checks in a 10m radius.

name: Repair Kit (Basic)
description: Contains common tools and patch materials. Grants +1 to Fix (Int) checks for minor repairs.

name: Signal Jammer (Local)
description: Disrupts non-encrypted comms in a 50m radius for 1d6 rounds. Single use battery.

name: Medical Autoinjector (1 Use)
description: Automatically injects a standard stim-dose or pain suppressor. Faster use in combat (GM discretion).

name: Respirator Mask
description: Protects against airborne toxins and particulates for 1d6 hours. Single use filter.

name: Explosive Detonator (Remote)
description: Allows remote detonation of up to 3 compatible explosive charges within 500m.

name: Cybernetic Field Kit
description: Contains specialized tools for minor cybernetic maintenance or removal. Grants +1 to Heal (Int) or Fix (Int) for cybernetics.

name: Recreational Chip (1 Use)
description: A data chip containing low-grade entertainment, music, or passive mind-games. Can reduce 1 Stress from boredom.

name: Glow-Paint (Can)
description: Provides enough luminescent paint to mark a 2x2 meter area. Lasts 2d6 hours.

name: Personal Energy Shield Generator (1 Use)
description: Deploys a small, personal energy shield (AC 15, 3 HP) around user for 1d4 rounds. Single use.

name: Acoustic Dampener (Small)
description: Temporarily reduces ambient noise in a 5m radius, imposing -1 to Notice (Wis) checks for sound. Lasts 1d6 rounds. Single use.

name: Pressure Patch
description: Seals minor pressure leaks in environmental suits or small vehicles. Single use.

name: Emergency Flares (Pack of 3)
description: Fires a bright, signal flare up to 200m into the sky. Lasts 1d4 minutes.

name: Bio-Scrubber Kit
description: Cleanses minor biological contaminants from surfaces. Grants +1 to Fix (Int) for bio-hazard cleanup.

name: Trace Detector (1 Use)
description: Single use device that can detect traces of specific substances (e.g., specific explosives, narcotics) in a small area. Provides +2 to Notice (Wis) for that substance.

name: Neural Shunt
description: Temporarily disconnects damaged cybernetics to prevent system shock. Grants +2 to Con saves vs. cybernetic overload. Lasts 1d4 hours. Single use.

name: Sonic Stunner (1 Use)
description: Emits a focused burst of non-lethal sound. Target must make Con save or be Suppressed for 1d4 rounds. Short range (10m).

name: Self-Sealing Bandages (3 uses)
description: Applies instantly to small cuts and lacerations, preventing blood loss and infection. Provides 1 point of healing per use.

name: Cryo-Spray (1 Use)
description: Can briefly freeze a small area or disable simple electronic locks for 1d4 rounds. Short range (5m).

name: Data Crystal (Blank)
description: A small, robust crystal for storing sensitive or encrypted data. Capacity for 100GB.

name: Psi-Dampener Injector (1 Use)
description: When injected, suppresses active psionic abilities for 1d4 rounds. Target makes Con save to resist.

name: Chemical Incapacitant Spray
description: Target must make Con save or be incapacitated (helpless) for 1d4 rounds. Short range (5m cone). Single use.

name: Mini-Torch
description: A small, handheld cutting torch. Can cut through thin metal sheets or basic locks in 1d4 rounds. Limited fuel (5 uses).

name: Emergency Locator Beacon
description: Activates a distress signal detectable up to 1000km for 24 hours. Single use.

name: Nutrient Bar
description: A compact, high-energy bar. Provides one meal.

name: Stim-Patch (Adrenaline)
description: Applies a fast-acting adrenaline boost. Grants +1 bonus to Initiative rolls for 1 combat, or +1 Str for 1 minute. Single use.

name: Universal Solvent (Ampule)
description: Can dissolve most organic or synthetic materials in a small area (e.g., bypass a locked door's mechanism, destroy evidence). Single use.

name: Voice Modulator (Disposable)
description: Can mimic one pre-recorded voice or apply a basic voice filter for 1d4 minutes. Single use battery.

name: Anti-Gravity Repulsor (Small)
description: Can push or lift light objects (up to 50kg) for 1d4 rounds. Short range (5m). Single use battery.

name: Remote Viewer (Disposable)
description: A small camera drone that can be launched up to 100m away, transmitting video for 1d4 minutes. Breaks on impact.

name: Lockdown Override Keycard (Generic)
description: A single-use, generic keycard that can bypass low-level security lockdowns (DC 8 Program check to use). Has a 25% chance to trigger an alert.

name: Stasis Field Emitter (Personal)
description: Creates a small, temporary stasis field (AC 18, 5 HP) around a single target for 1 round, trapping them. Single use.

name: Emergency Chronometer
description: A small, rugged device that provides precise timekeeping for 1 month.

name: Geological Survey Marker (3 Pack)
description: Small, deployable markers that transmit basic geological data to a paired receiver (range 1km) for 24 hours. Used for mapping.

name: Hacking Rig (Disposable)
description: A small, pre-loaded hacking rig. Provides a +1 bonus to one Program (Int) check to bypass a digital security system. Destroys itself after use.

name: Environmental Purifier Tablet
description: When deployed, purifies a 10m radius of common airborne toxins for 1d4 hours. Single use.

name: Synth-Caffeine Patch (3 Pack)
description: Provides a burst of mental alertness. Grants +1 bonus to Wisdom checks for 1d4 hours. Can cause jitters (-1 Dex) after effect.

name: Optic Camo Spray (1 Use)
description: Provides a temporary +1 bonus to Sneak (Dex) checks for 1d4 rounds by subtly distorting light around the user. Single use.

name: Magnetic Lock Release
description: Can open standard magnetic locks in 1 round. Single use battery.

name: Sonic Cleaner
description: A small device that uses high-frequency vibrations to clean small objects or surfaces. Useful for removing trace evidence (requires Fix (Int) check).

name: Neural Disruptor (1 Use)
description: Deals 1d6 non-lethal damage. Target must make Con save or be Suppressed for 1d4 rounds. Short range (10m). Requires Program (Int) to target.

name: Personal Medkit (3 Uses)
description: Contains basic bandages and antiseptic for self-treatment. Each use provides 1d2 healing, but takes 1 action.

name: Emergency Food Paste (Tube)
description: A single tube of highly concentrated nutrient paste. Provides one full meal.

name: IR Goggles (Battery)
description: Provides low-light and infrared vision for 4 hours on a single standard battery.

name: Portable Data Extractor
description: Can attempt to retrieve data from a physically damaged data storage device (DC 9 Program check). Single use battery.

name: Gravity Clamp (Small)
description: Can temporarily secure an object (up to 100kg) to a surface for 1d6 rounds. Single use battery.

name: Disguise Components (Improvised)
description: A collection of generic clothing, hair dye, and basic prosthetics for a quick, rough disguise. Grants +1 to Disguise (Cha) check. One use.

name: Miniaturized Scavenger Drone
description: Small, disposable drone capable of picking up small items (up to 5kg) and returning them to user (range 50m). Single use.

name: Sonic Resonator (Small)
description: Can be used to detect hidden compartments or structural weaknesses through resonance feedback. Grants +1 to Notice (Wis) checks for hidden areas. Single use battery.

name: Emergency Stasis Pouch
description: A small pouch that can preserve a single, small organic item (e.g., tissue sample, small animal) in stasis for 1d6 days. Single use.

name: Water Reclamation Filter
description: Can reclaim water from non-potable sources (e.g., urine, stagnant water) for 3 uses. Requires Fix (Int) check.

name: Psionic Suppressor Collar (Disposable)
description: Temporarily suppresses psionic abilities (Con save to resist) for 1d6 rounds when applied. Single use.

name: Recreational VR Chip
description: A chip loaded with pre-Scream VR experiences. Can reduce 1 Stress from boredom or fear. Addictive potential.

name: Bio-scanner (Portable)
description: A handheld scanner for detecting life signs and basic biological anomalies within a 10m range. Single use battery (4 hours).

name: Detonator Cord (10m)
description: Used to connect and remotely detonate multiple explosive charges.

name: Pressure Syringe (Empty)
description: An empty, sterile syringe for taking fluid samples or administering custom compounds.

name: Neural Interface Tap (Disposable)
description: Allows temporary, limited access to a standard neural interface port for 1d4 minutes. Grants +1 to Program (Int) for accessing simple data.

name: Environmental Suit Repair Kit
description: Contains patches and seals for repairing minor damage to environmental suits. Grants +1 to Fix (Int) for suit repairs.
